markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Clubhead Poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1998)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Injury" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=97" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 68 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 340 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This poison is named for the strain of fungi from which it's distilled. Hallucinations assail the victim's mind, causing them to see imaginary foes.

 **Saving Throw** DC 32 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 3d8 poison damage, [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16), and can't take reactions (1 round); **Stage 2** 4d8 poison damage, flat-footed, can't take reactions, [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) (1 round); **Stage 3** 5d8 poison damage, flat-footed, can't take reactions, and stunned 1 (1 round)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Clubhead Poison
